thread.title: Fallout Shelter is coming to Xbox One next week
thread.title_full: Fallout Shelter is coming to Xbox One next week • Eurogamer.net

title: Fallout Shelter is coming to Xbox One next week
text:
Fallout Shelter is coming to Xbox One and Windows 10 on Tuesday, 7th February.
Like the mobile version of Fallout Shelter, this will be a free download.
It will also be a Play Anywhere affair, meaning save data and Achievements will be shared between the Xbox One and Windows 10 versions.
This management sim puts players in the role of an Overseer, lording over a nuclear fallout shelter. Since the game's initial 2015 launch, Bethesda has added various content updates, bringing such things as pets, crafting, Fallout 4 characters, quests and more to this casual spin-off.
The developer has completely reworked the controls to make Fallout Shelter compatible with a gamepad.
